Title: Winchester
Genre: Biography, Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Writer: Tom Vaughan, Michael Spierig, Peter Spierig
Actors: Helen Mirren, Sarah Snook, Finn Scicluna-O'Prey, Jason Clarke
Plot: Ensconced in her sprawling San Jose, California mansion, eccentric firearm heiress Sarah Winchester (Dame Helen Mirren) believes she is haunted by the souls of people killed by the Winchester repeating rifle.
Production: Imagination Design Works, Bullitt Entertainment, Diamond Pictures, Blacklab Entertainment
